headline: Old Dominion Faces Analyst Split After Earnings Miss and August LTL Decline
summary: Old Dominion Freight Line, Inc. (NASDAQ:ODFL) is one of the 13 Best Freight Stocks to Invest in Now. The second quarter’s earnings miss causes mixed opinions among analysts, while the decline in LTL tons per day impacts the August revenue. The company’s revenue during the quarter declined by 6.1% year-over-year and missed the analyst estimates […]

headline: Is Old Dominion Freight Line Underperforming the S&P 500?
summary: Old Dominion Freight Line has notably underperformed the broader S&P 500 over the past year, and analysts remain cautious about the stock’s prospects.
